sentences.en: A boat sailing against the current must forge ahead or it will be driven back.
sentences.cn: 逆水行舟,不进则退.

sentences.en: a forged passport
sentences.cn: 假护照

sentences.en: a move to forge new links between management and workers
sentences.cn: 努力建立劳资新关系的措施

sentences.en: Back in the 1980s, they were attempting to forge a new kind of rock music.
sentences.cn: 20世纪80年代，他们尝试开创一种新的摇滚乐。

sentences.en: Difficulties help to forge people into able folk.
sentences.cn: 困难有助于把人们锻炼成能干的人.

sentences.en: Everything new comes from the forge of hard and bitter struggle.
sentences.cn: 一切新东西都是从艰苦斗争中锻炼出来的.

sentences.en: Face the rough weather of struggle and forge ahead.
sentences.cn: 迎着斗争的风浪前进.

sentences.en: He began to heat, like iron in the forge.
sentences.cn: 他象锻炉里的铁一样热起来.

sentences.en: He feels stronger, and he is ready to forge on to Prague.
sentences.cn: 他觉得精力恢复了不少, 他随时可以启程去布拉格.

sentences.en: I went towards the forge under the sweet green limes.
sentences.cn: 我趁着那芬芳的菩提树的绿荫,奔向铁匠铺子.

sentences.en: If we forge ahead continuously without a break, we'll be able to raise efficiency.
sentences.cn: 如果我们不停顿地继续前进, 我们就能提高效率.

sentences.en: Now is the time to forge ahead with all the enthusiasm and optimism that you can manage.
sentences.cn: 现在到了拿出你最大的热情和积极性，努力进取的时候了。

sentences.en: Someone stole my credit card and forged my signature.
sentences.cn: 有人偷了我的信用卡，并假冒我的签名。

sentences.en: swords forged from steel
sentences.cn: 用钢锻造的刀剑

sentences.en: The blacksmith came out of the forge to fit the horse shoe.
sentences.cn: 铁匠从工场出来安装马蹄铁.

sentences.en: The programme aims to forge links between higher education and small businesses.
sentences.cn: 这个项目旨在为高等教育和小企业之间建立联系。

sentences.en: The two women had forged a close bond.
sentences.cn: 这两个女人结下了亲密情谊。

sentences.en: They agreed to forge closer economic ties.
sentences.cn: 他们同意建立更加紧密的经济联系。

sentences.en: To forge a blade takes great skill.
sentences.cn: 锻造刀刃需要很高超的技巧。

sentences.en: We will say that he was unexpectedly found at his forge again.
sentences.cn: 这回他又出人意外地在他的小熔炉边干起活儿来.

trans.tran_en: a large piece of equipment that produces high temperatures, used for heating and shaping metal objects

trans.tran_cn: 锻制，锻造，伪造，犯伪造罪
trans.tran_en: to move somewhere or continue doing something in a steady determined way

trans.tran_cn: 锻造，伪造，捏造，编造，制订
